pullRequest.title: Make UnionMap#entrySet won't return multiple values for same key
pullRequest.bodyText:
Current UnionMap#entrySet doesn't return the same size like UnionMap#size.
Fix #3044
--
Found an issue can be fixed and @anuraaga already has the correct code, so copy from there.

commit.message: Make UnionMap#entrySet won't return multiple values for same key

nodes.bodyText: We aren't using Guava in the other project but Sets.union should work fine here.
nit: Could introduce second.entrySet() as a local variable and reuse?
IIUC, Sets.union() returns an immutable view, so there`s no need to wrap it again. It also handles the duplicate entries already, so maybe we can simplify most of this pull request?

commit.message:
Revert "Use Guava Sets"

This reverts commit 2416694f

nodes.bodyText: This is the last comment I believe: Do we need to wrap ConcatenatedSet with UnmodifiableSet? It looks unmodifiable already.
